org.jpws.pwslib.order

Class DefaultRecordWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpws.pwslib.order.DefaultRecordWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<DefaultRecordWrapper>, Collatable

    public class DefaultRecordWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<DefaultRecordWrapper>, Collatable, java.lang.Cloneable
    This class wraps a PwsRecord for purposes of quick reference to a listing sort value derived from and belonging to the record.

    Mutability Status: This class walks from the assumption that the record fields constituting the sort value (namely GROUP and TITLE) will not likely change during the lifetime (validity) of an instance. Hence the sort value is not recalculated except through the use of refresh() . The practised strategy is to substitute wrappers of a record by a new instance whenever a permanent modification occurs on the referenced record's content.

        public static java.lang.String defaultTitle

        public static DefaultRecordWrapper[] makeWrappers(PwsRecord[] recs,
                                  java.util.Locale loc)
        Creates an array of wrappers for a given set of PwsRecord. (Records used in direct reference.) If the parameter recs is null, null is also returned.
        Parameters:
        recs - array of PwsRecord; may be null
        loc - Locale used in the wrapper objects; null for VM default
        Returns:
        array of DefaultRecordWrapper or null

      • refreshExpiry

        Recalculates the expiry status of this record according to actual compare values.
        Parameters:
        expireScope - long time duration in milliseconds (delta)

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        Refreshes all derived values of this wrapper from the underlying record value. Note that Expiry is recalculated by this with the standard scope of Global.DEFAULT_EXPIRESCOPE.

      • setLocale

        public void setLocale(java.util.Locale l)
        Sets a locale for the sort value of this wrapper. This determines the value of the collation key.
        Parameters:
        l - locale to be activated for the collation key

        public int getExpiry()
        Expire status of this record. Returns 0 if not expired.
        Returns:

        Import status of this record. Returns 0 if not imported.
        Returns:

        public java.text.CollationKey getCollationKey()

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        The displayable title of the contained record. Consists of the TITLE field plus, if opted in program options, the USERNAME field. The result of this is depending on the value of Global.isDisplayUsernames().
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String title

      • hasText

        public boolean hasText(java.lang.String text,
              boolean cs,
              boolean wd)
        Whether this record contains the search text as specified.
        Parameters:
        text - String search text
        cs - boolean whether search is case sensitive
        wd - boolean whether search looks for whole words only
        Returns:
        boolean true if and only if the search text is contained in any one text field except the password
